applications.name: 吧唧吧唧吃
applications.description:
This is Pug #1 and he is really hungry! The only way to make him happy is to feed him as fast as you can. Do it properly and as Grandma pug says: “Chomp to nom if you want to be a good bloke, otherwise bad things will happen and you’re going to choke!”.

Fist endless game by the Squarefrog Games gang. Endless and delicious! Beat your own score and save the pug from starvation.

applications.name: 旋转平衡球
applications.description:
A game that looks beautiful but may just bring out the ugliness in you!

Its rotating circles are unlike anything you've seen before and it’s your job to make sure they don’t crash –which sounds easy but gets progressively challenging.

Hysperical is really easy to grasp right away, but oh-so-hard to master – have fun along the way!

· Simply tap screen to place spheres on rotating circles
· Making sure the spheres don’t crash
· 100 different levels – each one a new brain puzzle
· Free to play!

Possibly impossible! That’s Hyspherical.
applications.releaseNotes:
Added iCloud - you can now play on multiple devices and keep the progression in sync!
Added share buttons to level completed screen.
Fixed a bug that caused a dead end if two spheres crashed at the same time a level completed.
Improved design to make it more obvious which circles are playable and not.
Improved chapter changing speed.
Improved chapter buttons to be easier to touch.

applications.name: 太空流星
applications.description:
"It is rock hard. This game is absolutely going to make you weep." - AppSpy.com

"Best horizontal shmup you're not playing!" - TouchArcade forum

"Really cool game!" - ily2811

[How to play]

Hold to Fire.
Drag to move.
Double tap to warp.
applications.releaseNotes:
- Enemy bullets move more slowly
- Smaller hit area of player

applications.name: 盒子忍者
applications.description:
In order to save the princess, you must into the enemy's castle, start a ninja war.

Game features:
*Comic style.
*Darts, nails, invisibility, shadow warrior, this is a real ninja war.
*A variety of attack methods, you can choose a personalized way to play.
*There are many kinds of enemy, so your tactics will determine success or failure.
*10 different rooms and 40 levels, fight for the highest level.
*Get your score and dare to your friends.

applications.name: 厉害的小偷
applications.description:
有一天, 外面有异常的声音吵醒了我。从我家的窗户往外面看,我就发现有一个很厉害的小偷在

从这个大楼的屋顶飞到那个大楼的顶楼,一个在一个。连警察也抓不了他。他好快啦。。。

applications.name: 3D疯狂摩托
applications.description:
2014年度最经典摩托赛车！各种不同玩法。双向车道穿梭。享受在午夜时分，漆黑之中的极速自在！你永久不知道下一刻的速度到底有多快！还在等什么呢？下载游戏，NOW，比比谁更快！！！

游戏特色：
-重力感应操控，感触游戏激烈的冲击力。
-多种共同游戏布景，感触不一样的极速。
-火爆的音乐带给你非一般的游戏体会。
-细节明晰，画面精密，给人激烈的视觉冲击。

applications.name: 别撞车
applications.description:
全球爆火虐心小游戏第二弹，蓄势待发

别撞车！这就是本游戏唯一的规则。

[怎么玩] 点击屏幕任何位置，控制小车变道，够简单吧，想玩得好可没那么容易。

快来挑战自我，打败你的朋友！
applications.releaseNotes: 解决系统7.0以下闪退的问题

applications.name: 越狱3 : 太平间之逃生魔术
applications.description:
我想生活可以归结为一种简单的选择：不是忙着活，就是忙着死。极限难度的密室逃脱游戏，您敢来挑战吗？
你被误判终身监禁，你已经服刑10年的生活，但过去5年你一直在规划你的越狱.
可是由于和一个犯人打架，你的脑部受伤，在有健忘症的情况下！如何逃出“太平间”？来实施越狱计划的最后一步，现在就来寻找线索吧！

任务：找到百万美金和TNT, 炸开停尸间...

√提示：
1 极限难度：1%的人可以通关，确实很多用户表示很囧。
2 在每个场景中都有隐藏的线索，可以通过划动屏幕切换不同的场景，收集并组合相关的物品才可以完成任务，需要一点点耐心哦～～
3 更多场景和隐藏物品，陆续更新中,喜欢的话给我们一个评价，这是我们前行的最大动力...

亲们，非常感谢您的下载，祝您好运：）～～

P.S.
1在真实的监狱中，没人会给你提示的，游戏设计中没有提示也是为了最大程度增加真实感，最大限度挑战您的环境推理能力。
2 广告是本游戏的唯一收入来源，可以补贴部份我们制作后续精彩关卡的资金投入。我们仅限在一个场景植入了广告，并不会影响游戏的剧情。望您给予理解，谢谢！
亲，我们真心不接收因为以上两个原因的“差评”，亲们，请手下留情！

越狱 1 珍藏版:
https://itunes.apple.com/app/id871548702
越狱 2 : 刑房之死亡证据:
https://itunes.apple.com/app/id866426773
越狱 3 : 太平间之最后的呐喊
https://itunes.apple.com/app/id917862625


感谢下载！ 谢谢！
A99H Studio
http://www.a99h.com

applications.name: 神秘代码
applications.description: 一款解谜类的游戏。游戏是以你得知克莱顿叔叔失踪，你马上开始调查，以追查那些蛛丝马迹为开头，将游戏剧情一点点的展开，你需要破解一个个谜题，才能追查这个事件背后的幕后黑手。

applications.name: 打鼹鼠
applications.description:
Your favorite classic arcade game now available for your iPhone, iPod Touch or iPad! The classic match-up of mallet vs. mole is taken out of the arcades and dropped into a bright, colorful 3D world with new ways to play and more moles to WHAC than ever before! Follow the white mole and navigate the fun-filled land of Whac-A-Mole!

•The original first person…smacker! Tap and swipe your way to victory against those pesky critters!

•Try your mallet at 60 levels of mole-hammering action!

•It’s a mole-vasion! Clear out the moles from the Farm, Jungle and Wild West worlds.

•Collect coins and buy powerful new mallets like the lightning mallet!

Download the game today and chase that white mole!
applications.releaseNotes:
Brand New App Icon!

Game enhancements and bug fixes
